text: (Aey Nabi), jab tum in logon ke saamne koi nishani (yani moajiza) pesh nahin karte to yeh kehte hain ke tumne apne liye koi nishani kyun na intekhab karli? Insey kaho â€œmain to sirf us wahee ki pairwi karta hoon jo mere Rubb ne meri taraf bheji hai, yeh baseerat (vision) ki roshniyan hain tumhare Rubb ki taraf se aur hidayat aur rehmat hai un logon ke liye jo isey qabool karein
